text: Ani aneka paigambarancya sobata(rahuna)aneka allahavalyanni jihada (dharmayud'dha) kele ahe. Tyannahi allahacya margata duhkha-yatana pohacalya, parantu na tara tyanni dhairya sodale, na kamajora padale ani na prabhavita (dabale gele) jhale ani allaha dhira-sanyama rakhanaryansi prema rakhato
